column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A garbage truck caused serious damage at  ------7 pm on October 26
column6: Sen Sok District.------According to a source from the scene
column8: the driver of garbage truck reversed after missing some rubbish
column9: but didn’t look where he was going
column10: and maybe got confused about which pedal was for ‘go’ and which was for ‘stop’.------Instead the truck took out a tuk-tuk
column11: a mobile food cart before slamming backwards into a shop selling electronics.------The police have seized all vehicles involved and are working for a legal settlement.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/726282.html------
